archimate:Capability.name: Supplier/Partner Assurance Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Supplier/Partner Assurance Management provides the necessary functionality to manage problems that are being passed on to the supplier/partner, originating with the supplier/partner and being passed to the service provider, as well as assuring that both the service provider and the supplier/partner are meeting the product and service obligations set out in the contract.Interactions between the service provider and the partner can be �bidirectional� while solving a mutual customer�s problem.

properties.value: Handling customer inquiries & issues Passing/receiving inquires and issues Performance Management Receiving problems
